snippet: Mike Greenstein, 91, has been achieving feats of strength for most of his life, having learned from his showman father.
abstract: Corey Kilgannon Character Study column on Mike Greenstein, son of legendary strongman Joe Greenstein; Mike has earned the nickname the Mighty Atom Jr by following in his father's footsteps and emulating his feats, including pulling or lifting heavy weights--like trucks--with his hair or teeth.
lead_paragraph: Mike Greenstein, 91, has been achieving feats of strength for most of his life, having learned from his showman father.

headline.print_headline: A Truck Is No Match for His Teeth
headline.seo: For Mike Greenstein, 91, a Truck Is No Match for His Teeth
headline.main: A Truck Is No Match for His Teeth
